Row.Text: I--no!! I can't lose, not here! If only I could use Raising Heart...Fate-chan, Signum, Vita, everyone...Vivio...I'm so sorry I couldn't have been stronger...

Oh, hey there! My name is Nanoha Takamachi, leader of the Time-Space Administration Bureau.[NEWLINE]...well, kinda. See, we can't get back in touch with our headquarters, so we're kinda stuck here...maybe you can help us get back home! I hope we can get along!
You have officially declared war on the Time-Space Administration Bureau. Then, so be it.[NEWLINE]Let me...cool your head a little.
...you've caught us at a bad time. But, that doesn't matter. I've fought stronger enemies than you and won. I have no intention of backing down.
You have officially declared war on the Time-Space Administration Bureau. Then, so be it.[NEWLINE]Let me...cool your head a little.
You have officially declared war on the Time-Space Administration Bureau. Then, so be it.[NEWLINE]Let me...cool your head a little.
...you've caught us at a bad time. But, that doesn't matter. I've fought stronger enemies than you and won. I have no intention of backing down.
You have officially declared war on the Time-Space Administration Bureau. Then, so be it.[NEWLINE]Let me...cool your head a little.
We may not be able to use our Devices, but we won't need them. You and I are about to meet on the field of battle, the old-fashioned way. Do you think you can handle the full power of Riot Force 6?
We may not be able to use our Devices, but we won't need them. You and I are about to meet on the field of battle, the old-fashioned way. Do you think you can handle the full power of Riot Force 6?
Some may call me a devil for betraying your trust. But, I'm doing what needs to be done.[NEWLINE]I'm fine with being a devil. You're going to listen to what I have to say, like it or not!
Even Vita and Signum are starting to warm up to you! That's pretty impressive, you know.
Hey again!
How are things? We're still trying to get back in touch with HQ, ourselves.
How are you?
Just so we're clear...I'd prefer if we didn't, but if you're here to fight, then I will not hesitate to respond in kind. Now, what do you want?
Your soldiers are stationed just outside of Bureau territory. We will retaliate if you choose to attack. Now, what is your response?
As the leader of the Bureau's presence on this planet, all of our land claims are considered Bureau property. If you continue to expand near them, we may be forced to respond...with our military.
It may not be within protocol, but in these strange circumstances, we would like to negotiate free passage between the territories of our settlements.
This deal really helped us out a lot! Would you like to sign off on it again?
I'm really sorry, but I'm not sure if we can keep up this deal. Maybe we can discuss it again...?
The stories of your empire's riches are impressive! Still, though, if you went to the stores back on the real Mid-Childa, I don't know if they'd accept gold as payment...
I'm very impressed by your military! I was talking with the others, and we'd like to arrange some mock duels between our best officers sometime! What do you say?
Your terrible reputation precedes you. Make no mistake...if you continue your path of hurting others, I will not hesitate to shoot you down.
Would you like to be friends with me, Fate-chan, and everyone else? It'd be a lot better than us fighting each other, don't you think?
Okay!
Good!
Okay, what did you have in mind?
I don't guess you'd have any interdimensional communicators to trade? Hehehe, just kidding...
Okay, what did you have in mind?
Thank you!
The Ace of Aces doesn't give up so easily.
We've only just gotten started.
